page.title: 19RECREATION / CLUBS
page.content:
{ "Breakdancing}is fashionable.The many movements include{Backspins, {Turtle, Windmills, Headspins, {Hand-glide, Foot Work, Donkey-kick, & {Caterpillar.}Most breakdancers have a Street name; mine is{'Tiny Tot' because I'm small."
"I go to a{Youth Club}at the Leisure Centre. We have a disco with flashing lights. There is a television room, and we can also play snooker, badminton and table tennis. It costs 10 pence per evening for members."
"Each week I go to{Guides.}There are 4 patrols in our company -{Canaries, {Robins, Chaffinches and Nightingales. I am leader of the Canaries and have to organise games, go to meetings and control the pack. We are trying to raise Â£75 for a C.A.T. scanner."
